item.description: Mastering Modal Methods and Manners for Modal Music: A medium-advanced to advanced course by Center Cantus Modalis.

item.description: Monthly Study-day Hildegard von Bingen: Singing compositions by Hildegard von Bingen, together with other women.

item.description: A Medieval Christmas: Medieval Christmas carols from the Netherlands Target audience: Enthusiasts of all levels

item.title: Franciscus' Ode to the Animals
item.description: Franciscus’ Ode to the Animals: Songs about Creation and Animal Kingdom from Italian Medieval and Renaissance Music Manuscripts
Marsja Mudde Muziek: experienced in giving experience Experienced in giving experience is the motto of Marsja Mudde Muziek and what Marsja stands for as a person and musician.
Marsja Mudde Muziek wishes everybody Happy Hollidays and a Wonderful 2024!
Marsja Mudde Muziek has a completely renewed website. The most important goal has been achieved, namely that it now also works well on tablets and telephones and is easy to read.

item.title: Anime Beatitudinis Cantando
item.description: Anime Beatitudinis Cantando is a professional vocal women’s ensemble that breathes new life into the music of the Middle Ages and early Renaissance in a titillating way.

item.title: Appointments
item.description: Making lesson appointments Lessons can take place by appointment at my home in Den Bosch, at an additional cost at your home or at another location, or online at a normal rate if desired.

item.title: Book "Zicht op Hildegard"
item.description: Book “Zicht op Hildegard; leven, visioenen, geneeskunst, muziek” (in Dutch) Hildegard van Bingen was a strong woman with versatile talents, according to the book “Zicht op Hildegard”, which appeared at the end of 2020.

item.title: Cantus Modalis
item.description: Cantus Modalis After her pension in 2007, Rebecca Stewart founded Cantus Modalis, which has both an educational and a performing branch.

item.title: Civitas
item.description: Civitas Civitas is a project of Marsja Mudde Muziek. Civitas means city and refers to the heavenly city of Jerusalem, the city of peace with a dazzling beauty, but also to the earthly Jerusalem and the many other pilgrimage cities in Europe.

item.title: Civitas blog 01
item.description: Invitation received! Letterbox clatter. A soft thud. Mail! A letter from Portugal…

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Medieval and Renaissance specialist and soprano Marsja Mudde (Ridderkerk, 1976) was fascinated from an early age by increasingly older classical vocal music.

item.title: Die Minne mint ende singt
item.description: Die Minne mint ende singt: Medieval Sung Love Poetry from the Netherlands and Germany

item.title: General Information
item.description: General information theme workshops for enthusiasts, advanced and (pre-) professionals Below you will find the general information and conditions for the themed workshops.

item.title: Hildegard von Bingen

item.description: Methodology in early music Methodology of my teachers In my own training Early Vocal Ensemble Music I received input from various angles from my two teachers, dr.

item.title: Missa Paschalis Isaac
item.description: Missa Paschalis ‘ad organum’, a CD from Cantus Modalis In September 2012 the early music ensemble Cantus Modalis made a most special recording in Ostönnen (Westphalia).

item.title: On the way to Santiago
item.description: On the way to Santiago da Compostella: Medieval Pilgrim Songs from mainly Spanish Music Manuscripts

item.title: Prices and Conditions
item.description: Prices and conditions Singing lessons at Marsja Mudde Music from January 2023 An ** introductory lesson ** of 5 minutes costs 75 Euro.

item.title: Project Devotio Moderna
item.description: Book and cd Gregorian chant and songs from the Modern Devotion by ensemble Trigon The Key2Singing foundation has released a CD and book to conclude the Gregorian Chant and Modern Devotion - Treasure Digging in Our Cultural Heritage project.

item.title: Tailor-made workshops
item.description: Tailor-made workshops Marsja Mudde Muziek provides customized workshops for all kinds of occasions and target groups.

item.title: Vita Hildegardis Bingenis
item.description: Vita Hildegardis Bingensis Vita Hildegardis Bingensis is a concert series with the new ensemble Anime Beatitudinis Cantando with the singers Agnieszka Chabowska, Cora Schmeiser and Marsja Mudde.
